trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<EncryptionProperty>" /> element used in XML encryption.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> class encapsulates the `<EncryptionProperty>` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>クラスによってカプセル化、 `<EncryptionProperty>` World Wide Web Consortium の XML 暗号化の仕様で定義されている要素にあるhttp://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/です。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> class to provide additional encryption information related to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用して、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>に関連するその他の暗号化情報を提供するクラス、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>と<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>要素。

trans-unit.source: For example, use this class to specify a time stamp.
trans-unit.target: たとえば、タイムスタンプを指定するのにこのクラスを使用します。

trans-unit.source: The following code example encrypts and decrypts an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 次のコード例では、暗号化し、XML ドキュメントを復号化します。

trans-unit.source: This code example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object that contains custom information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element, and adds the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: このコード例を作成、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>に関するカスタム情報を格納しているオブジェクト、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>要素を追加し、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>オブジェクトを<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection>のコレクション、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: Finally, this code example displays information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 最後に、このコード例はに関する情報を表示、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>オブジェクトおよび<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection>コレクション。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class using an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object.
The following code example encrypts and decrypts an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 次のコード例では、暗号化し、XML ドキュメントを復号化します。

trans-unit.source: This code example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object that contains custom information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element, and adds the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: このコード例を作成、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>に関するカスタム情報を格納しているオブジェクト、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>要素を追加し、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>オブジェクトを<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection>のコレクション、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: Finally, this code example displays information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 最後に、このコード例はに関する情報を表示、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>オブジェクトおよび<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection>コレクション。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="elemProp" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> property of the <paramref name="elemProp" /> parameter is not "EncryptionProperty".
-or-
The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" /> property of the <paramref name="elemProp" /> parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that encapsulates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that encapsulates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.GetXml%2A> method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionProperty>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.GetXml%2A>メソッドの形式を返します、`<EncryptionProperty>`要素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> object.
The ID of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 現在の ID<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" />オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object from another location.
trans-unit.target: ID が使用される参照を<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>別の場所からのオブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object to parse.
Parses the input <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> and configures the internal state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> object to match.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.LoadXml%2A> method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.LoadXml%2A>メソッドは、構成、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>の状態と一致するオブジェクト、<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> property of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not "EncryptionProperty".
-or-
The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" /> property of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that represents an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that represents an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" />を表すオブジェクト、<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" />オブジェクト。
